metadata.title: CVE-2020-12458 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information-disclosure flaw was found in Grafana through 6.7.3. Thedatabase directory /var/lib/grafana and database file/var/lib/grafana/grafana.db are world readable. This can result in exposureof sensitive information (e.g., cleartext or encrypted datasourcepasswords).

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
